dcterms:description: The dataset was collected from September 2015 to June 2016, consisting of 6,843 events generated from 436 activities. The event stream was segmented manually for learning the true segment boundaries and evaluating the approach.
dcterms:title: Own Testbed Dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Le Bodic
P. De Loor
G. Calvet
J. Kahn
dcterms:description: SIHMM is a simulator for multimodal human-machine interaction, used as a baseline method for comparison in activity segmentation.
dcterms:title: siHMM Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. R. Kwapisz
G. M. Weiss
S. A. Moore
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for activity recognition using cell phone accelerometers, providing a basis for comparison in the context of activity segmentation.
dcterms:title: Activity Recognition Dataset using Cell Phone Accelerometers

dcterms:description: Various datasets referenced in related works that contribute to the understanding and development of activity recognition and segmentation methodologies.
dcterms:title: Various Datasets referenced in related works
